JurisCode.description: The unique code of the TaxJurisdiction

DutiableValue.description: The taxable duty amount in the jurisdiction

DutiableTaxRate.description: The duty rate as a percentage for the jurisdiction e.g 20.00

IsJuriTaxExempt.description: Is this TaxJurisdiction a tex exempt one? e.g Y

GLCode.description: A GL code associated with this TaxJurisdiction

Lineage.description: The event lineage (e.g eventId, asOf) that lead to the observed/derived state of this object/data part
